pullRequest.title: Added toast on debug info copy
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose / Description
I once had a user ask what to do once they clicked the button, I remembered this when accessing the screen, I hope this will mean it won't happen again
Approach
Add toast to both success and failure case.
I don't expect the failure case to happen
How Has This Been Tested?
On my device
Learning
Make everything as obvious as possible
Checklist

 You have not changed whitespace unnecessarily (it makes diffs hard to read)
 You have a descriptive commit message with a short title (first line, max 50 chars).
 Your code follows the style of the project (e.g. never omit braces in if statements)
 You have commented your code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
 You have performed a self-review of your own code

nodes.bodyText:
Not sure how clear it is. I'm not native, so my opinion may not be very relevant here.
I doubt that most users know what the clipboard is. And it's strange to "copy" when something is not shown in the first place.
I never gave it a thought, but I believe what would make the most sense is to open an intent to share some information, then they could send it by email, copy it themselves...
